en:
不止
(Bùzhǐ)

more than

Definitions of 不止
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

adverb
    more than
        以上, 不止, 开外
    not limited to
        不止
    without end
        不了, 不止
    incessantly
        不已, 连天, 不迭, 不止
